Name: Last Contingency
About the game: Welcome to a pre-release of Last Contingency! A post-apocalyptic based Survival game gearing towards Survival, I like the idea of a unique survival game that will hopefully build into something that will change the 'Survival' Genre & flourish into may new & creative ideas! Last Contingency has amazing & great features you can explore throughout the game & continues to be worked on. - creative building whether it be a shelter, box or a beautiful ranchers home! - crafting tools, weapons, clothing etc. - Zombies & animals - inventory management Help us grow & let us know what we can do as we like to listen to our community & take their ideas into consideration as well! This game as mentioned is being pre-released so there's so much more to come! - new types of animals to harvest and use their materials for multitudes of things - more entities & items to enhance crafting experiences & building - gun crafting, which uses gun components & materials to craft weapons making it a little more difficult to get to that end game experience. - team system - and much, much more!
Meta Title: Last Contingency: Dec 29, 2021, Richard H. and Full Overview
